title: Fan Leaf, "Rinaldo in the Garden of Armida"
medium: Technique: printed by chromolithography on 7&1 satin foundation.
inscribed: at top "Supplement to The Gentlewoman Christmas number" under leaf "Rinaldo in the Garden of Armida" on banner carried by putti. under "Replica of the Historic Fan reproduced by 'The Gentlewoman' with gracious permission, from the original in the possession of Her Majesty Queen Mary".
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 25 x 38.5 cm (9 13/16 x 15 3/16 in.)
description: Fan leaf with figures cavorting in a garden. Polychrome.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fan Leaf, "Rinaldo in the Garden of Armida".
Technique: printed by chromolithography on 7&1 satin foundation.. Gift of Dorothy R. Gallanter. 1990-76-1.
